Quickstart

Perform your first Odefy simulation in just one minute:
  • Run MATLAB and change to the Odefy directory

  • Setup Odefy by running InitOdefy

  • Start the simulation dialog with Simulate and choose feedforward.txt from the examples/ directory.

  • Click Edit initial values, then double-click the zero value of species a and set it to 1, confirm by clicking OK

  • From the Simulation type list, choose HillCube (normalized)

  • Click Simulate to perform a time-course simulation of the ODE-converted model

    

Odefy by CMB, http://cmb.helmholtz-muenchen.de/odefy
